He led Team Europe to a Ryder Cup victory, boosting his net worth to $250 million. Despite a Ryder Cup incident, his leadership and bold play defined his powerful year.

description: The Asia Cup final was embroiled in controversy, with PCB chief Mohsin Naqvi at its center. Indian players refused to accept the winning trophy from him, causing significant delays and Naqvi walking off. This dramatic incident, marked by fan backlash, overshadowed India's ninth Asia Cup triumph.

title: EA to go private in $55 billion buyout: Silver Lake, PIF, and Affinity Partners lead deal
description: Electronic Arts is set to go private in a $55 billion acquisition by Silver Lake, Saudi Arabia’s PIF, and Affinity Partners. This major leveraged buyout allows EA to restructure and innovate without public market pressures, aiming to strengthen its position amidst intense gaming competition. The move provides flexibility for long-term growth strategies.

description: Shivam Dube's crucial 33 not out and economical bowling in the Asia Cup final against Pakistan drew accolades from his former coach, Satish Samant. Samant praised Dube's journey, natural six-hitting ability, and dedication, attributing his success to hard work and the team management's unwavering faith. Dube's vital contribution filled the void left by Hardik Pandya's absence.

description: PM Modi's congratulatory post for India's Asia Cup win, featuring "#OperationSindoor," ignited a political controversy. Congress leaders criticized the comparison of cricket to a battlefield and the politicization of sports. BJP, in turn, slammed Congress for its silence on India's victory, escalating the political back-and-forth.

His wife, Leanna Lenee, celebrated his effort and the team's win with a viral social media post. Hunter's dual-threat talent continues to be a unique storyline in his promising rookie season.

description: Former NFL star Robert Quinn faced arrest in North Charleston. Police bodycam footage shows him injured and confused. He allegedly backed his truck into a car and tried to leave. Officers charged him with reckless driving and property damage. This follows a 2023 hit-and-run case. Quinn's trial is set for December 2025. His off-field struggles now overshadow his football career.

Veterans questioned his death-over bowling and captain Salman Ali Agha’s decision to bring him on during a crucial phase, which ultimately shifted momentum firmly towards India.

description: One person was killed and several injured after Pakistan's security forces fired on protestors in PoK demonstrating over unresolved issues. A full-scale shutdown closed markets, while internet and phone services were suspended. Protests, joined by PTI, spread across districts, accusing the 'incompetent Anwar government' of repression.

title: Watch: Naqvi runs away with trophy; IPL team trolls PCB chief
description: India celebrated their Asia Cup 2025 victory over Pakistan but refused to accept the trophy from ACC president Mohsin Naqvi, an interim Pakistani minister. This decision stemmed from strained diplomatic relations following a terrorist attack. The BCCI plans to lodge a strong protest against Naqvi's actions at an upcoming ICC conference.

He settled in Dubai for its tax-friendly policies after leaving Russia over data privacy. Recently, Durov accused French intelligence of pressuring him to censor Moldovan channels, adding to his controversial public image amidst ongoing legal issues in France.

title: Abhishek, Gill's unseen celebration in luxury car - how much is it worth?
description: Indian cricketers Shubman Gill and Abhishek Sharma celebrated India's thrilling Asia Cup victory over Pakistan by taking a joyous spin in Abhishek's new car, a reward for his Player of the Tournament award. Their heartwarming camaraderie highlighted India's ninth Asia Cup crown, secured by Tilak Varma's match-winning knock in a tense chase against their arch-rivals.

description: President Donald Trump hosted Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif and Field Marshal Asim Munir at the White House last week. Among the senior American officials present was FBI Director Kash Patel. While Trump’s hospitality for Pakistan’s leadership was expected, the image of Patel — Indian-origin, Hindu, and a vocal defender of the Ram Mandir — warmly greeting Munir struck a raw nerve. The photo went viral, spawning accusations of betrayal, opportunism, and hypocrisy.

description: Accenture has laid off over 11,000 employees in the past three months, citing their inability to be retrained in AI skills, as it reshapes its workforce for the AI era. The company is simultaneously expanding its AI capabilities and plans to increase headcount, reflecting a broader industry trend of adapting to AI or facing obsolescence.

title: Trevon Diggs’ pregame jab sparks frenzy before Cowboys-Packers
description: Dallas Cowboys cornerback Trevon Diggs ignited online debate after a viral clip showed him walking away from Dak Prescott's pre-game speech. This incident, alongside previous controversies, fueled fan outrage and raised concerns about team chemistry and focus. The team's upcoming Week 4 performance will reveal their ability to overcome these off-field distractions.

title: World's highest bridge opens to traffic in China
description: China inaugurated the world's highest bridge, the Huajiang Grand Canyon Bridge, towering 2,051 feet above a river in Guizhou province. Concurrently, Polish skier Andrzej Bargiel achieved a historic first by climbing and skiing down Mount Everest without supplemental oxygen, a remarkable feat given the extreme conditions at high altitude.

title: Selena Gomez’s dress hints at Swift’s wedding designer choice
description: Selena Gomez's recent wedding to Benny Blanco, featuring a Ralph Lauren gown, has ignited widespread speculation about Taylor Swift's future bridal attire. Fans quickly noted Swift also wore Ralph Lauren for her engagement announcement to Travis Kelce. This connection, alongside their shared fashion history, suggests Gomez's choice offers a significant clue for Swift's highly anticipated wedding day look.

title: H-1B visa policy change: Canada PM responds to Trump, says ‘maybe we can …’
description: President Trump's significant H-1B visa fee increase to $100,000 has created a stir, prompting Canada to consider attracting highly skilled professionals. Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney and industry experts view this as a "wonderful opportunity" to draw talent left stranded by the US policy, despite potential challenges within Canada's immigration system.

title: Serena Williams unveils Meghan Markle’s as ever birthday gift
description: Serena Williams received a birthday gift from Meghan Markle. Meghan sent wine from her brand As Ever for Serena's 44th birthday on September 26, 2025. Serena shared the gift on Instagram. Meghan reposted the video. Their friendship began in 2010. They have supported each other through many events. This gift shows their bond continues.
